content:
Frozen hot Italian sausage is a versatile ingredient that can be used in a variety of dishes. Here are some ideas for meals you can make using frozen hot Italian sausage:

1. Pasta with Sausage and Tomato Sauce: Brown the sausage in a pan, then add a can of crushed tomatoes and some herbs (such as basil and oregano) and simmer for 20-30 minutes. Serve over cooked pasta with grated Parmesan cheese.
2. Sausage and Pepper Skillet: Cook sliced onions and bell peppers in a large skillet until tender, then add sliced sausage and cook until browned. Serve with crusty bread or over rice.
3. Sausage and Vegetable Soup: Brown the sausage in a large pot, then add diced vegetables (such as carrots, celery, and potatoes) and some broth. Simmer until the vegetables are tender, then serve with crusty bread.
4. Sausage and Egg Breakfast Burritos: Cook the sausage in a pan, then scramble some eggs and wrap them up with the sausage in tortillas. Add cheese, salsa, and avocado for a filling breakfast.
5. Sausage and Potato Hash: Brown the sausage in a skillet, then add diced potatoes and cook until tender. Serve with eggs and toast for a hearty breakfast or brunch.
6. Sausage and Bean Casserole: Brown the sausage in a skillet, then add canned beans (such as kidney or cannellini), diced tomatoes, and some herbs (such as thyme and rosemary). Transfer to a baking dish and bake in the oven until hot and bubbly.

These are just a few ideas to get you started. Frozen hot Italian sausage can be used in many other dishes, such as pizza, calzones, meatballs, and more. Get creative and enjoy!
